Gael García al gobierno de AMLO: "¿Para qué chingados votamos por ustedes?"
06 Nov 2019, 21:00 by EconomíaHoy.mx
El actor, productor y director mexicano Gael García Bernal publicó esta mañana en Twitter su indignación por el camino que el país ha llevado en los últimos meses. Se notó en descontento con la terrible violencia que se vive en México diario.
A través de su cuenta oficial de Twitter, el ganador del Globo de Oro en 207, comentó que "dan ganas de clausurar el país a cada rato" por la violencia, inseguridad y miedo que se vive a diario. Mostró además su molestia con el gobierno actual y su poca iniciativa para asumir responsabilidades.
A pesar de que el Gael García es activo en sus redes sociales para mostrar su apoyo a movimientos sociales como los recientemente ocurridos en Chile o en pro del medio ambiente, su indignación nació tras lo ocurrido el lunes en Chihuahua con la familia LeBarón.
text:
Gael García to the AMLO government: "Why the fuck do we vote for you?"
06 Nov 2019, 21:00 by EconomíaHoy.mx
Mexican actor, producer and director Gael García Bernal published his indignation on Twitter this morning for the path the country has taken in recent months. It was noted in discontent with the terrible violence that exists in Mexico every day.
Through his official Twitter account, the winner of the Golden Globe in 207, said that "they want to close the country every so often" because of the violence, insecurity and fear that is lived daily. He also showed his annoyance with the current government and his little initiative to assume responsibilities.
Although Gael García is active in his social networks to show his support for social movements such as those recently occurred in Chile or for the environment, his outrage was born after what happened Monday in Chihuahua with the LeBarón family.
